job.title: Software Engineer - UI
job.description: pHere at Walmart were driven by an intellectual curiosity that keeps us on the cuttingedge of user design and a seamless customer experience Were intrigued by the opportunity to engineer the most optimal approach that drives conversions and generates consumer loyalty across every touchpoint of the digital journeyppnbspppAs a strongemSoftware Engineer III  UI Developeremstrong youll spend your days translating requirements into solutions writing code collaborating with crossfunctional teams and providing us with the insights necessary to think beyond the status quo Youll oversee small project teams consisting of other engineers who will look to you as a trusted advisor a subject matter expert who provides guidance and the right tools to get the job doneppnbspppstrongYoull really wow us ifstrongpulliYour ability to rise above group think and see beyond the here and now is matched only by your intellectual curiositynbspliliYou come to the table with a comprehensive knowledge of frontend development as well as Agile methodologiesliliYou consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an everchanging environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertiseliliYou level up when you have the opportunity to teach others and empower those around you to excelliulpbrppstrongYoull make an impact bystrongpulliEffectively translating requirements into project parameters while working with agility from cradle to graveliliHelping crossfunctional teams to solve for business problems and develop solutions that enable us to redefine a bestinclass customer experienceliliEncouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insightdriven outcomesnbspliulpbrppstrongIdeal Candidate MustHavesstrongpulliBS degree in Computer Science or related fieldlili3 years of frontend software developmentliliBeing independent thinker and problem solverliliExperience with being a core contributor to a software project understanding domain and business requirements being responsible for critical parts of applicationliliSolid skills in React Native Angular JavaScript Java GoliliSolid experience with mobile development Android iOSliliExperience with ServerSide EngineeringliliExperience using source control systems gitliliExperience with working with CICD JenkinsTravisliliExperience with working with cloud deployments scaling resiliency load balancing etcliliExperience working in agile environment Scrum daily standups etcliulpbrppstrongBenefits amp Perksstrong nbspppBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great perks include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans and much more nbspppbrppstrongEqual Opportunity Employerstrong nbspppWalmart Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer  By Choice We believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them That means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions  while being inclusive of all people nbspppbrppstrongWho Westrong strongArestrongnbspppJoin Walmart and your work could help over 275 million global customers live better every week Yes we are the Fortune 1 company But youll quickly find were a company who wants you to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to work A career at Walmart is where the worlds most complex challenges meet a kinder way of life Our mission spreads far beyond the walls of our stores Join us and youll discover why we are a world leader in diversity and inclusion sustainability and community involvement  From day one youll be empowered and equipped to do the best work of your life careerswalmartcomnbspppbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanAbout Global Techstrong nbspppImagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech Were a team of 15000 software engineers data scientists and service professionals within Walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 22 million associates To others innovation looks like an app service or some code but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations emBeingem emhumanledem emis our true disruptionem nbspp
